1.name: 1. Tyuhvhj
1.description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital uses humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

2.name: 2. UFO
2.description: The missions of the Supreme Headquarters Alien Defence Organization (SHADO), which defends Earth from extra-terrestrial threats.

3.name: 3. Beneath the Planet of the Apes
3.description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

4.name: 4. All My Children
4.description: Set in the fictional East Coast suburb Pine Valley, this show is the decades-old, risk-taking soap that centers around Erica Kane and her long line of husbands.

5.name: 5. Darling Lili
5.description: Set during World War I, this movie is a cute spin on the Mata Hari legend.

6.name: 6. The Aristo Cats
6.description: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

7.name: 7. Airport
7.description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

8.name: 8. Patton
8.description: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

9.name: 9. Mary Tyler Moore Show
9.description: The lives and trials of a young single woman and her friends, both at work and at home.

10.name: 10. Chisum
10.description: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

11.name: 11. Kelly's Heroes
11.description: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines in WWII France to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

12.name: 12. Five Easy Pieces
12.description: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

13.name: 13. Love Story
13.description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

14.name: 14. The Partridge Family
14.description: The humorous adventures of a family of pop musicians.

15.name: 15. Valerie a týden divu
15.description: Surreal tale in which love, fear, sex, and religion merge into one fantastic world. Based on a classical Czech novel of the same title.

16.name: 16. Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
16.description: Singer Kelly McNamara, swinger Casey Anderson, and soul sister Petronella Danforth are sexy super-vixens who move to Hollywood, get discovered, and are thrown into a whirlpool of drugs, alcohol, lesbianism, abortions, violence, and sex.

17.name: 17. Tatort
17.description: An anthology series that follows the work of homicide detectives in Germany, Austria and Switzerland.

18.name: 18. The Vampire Lovers
18.description: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

19.name: 19. Catch-22
19.description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

20.name: 20. The Odd Couple
20.description: Two men, a neat freak and a slob separated from their wives, have to live together despite their differences.

21.name: 21. Rio Lobo
21.description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

22.name: 22. Il conformista
22.description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

23.name: 23. Soldier Blue
23.description: After a cavalry patrol is ambushed by the Cheyenne, the two survivors, a soldier and a woman, must reach the safety of the nearest fort.

24.name: 24. Little Big Man
24.description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

25.name: 25. Brewster McCloud
25.description: An introverted loner living in the bowels of the Astrodome plots to develop - with the aid of a mysterious guardian angel - a pair of wings that will help him fly.
